section.p:
Ankh is hooked directly into Visual Studios delete command, so when deleting a file with Visual Studio, the file is automatically deleted from the working copy. Items specified are scheduled for deletion upon the next commit. Files (and directories that have not been committed) are immediately removed from the working copy.
How to delete files:
1. Select and right click the file(s) you want to delete.
2.Select 'delete' from the menu.
3.Commit, if you want to add the changes to the repository.
Ankhs output window will show all the files that have been deleted.
